title: Workshop Safety Reminder
body: Keep roller shutter doors CLOSED when workshop heating is on. Open doors waste energy and increase costs. Close doors immediately after moving vehicles.

title: Maintenance Area Notice
body: New safety equipment has been installed in all maintenance areas. Please review the updated safety procedures in your department's safety manual.

title: Company-Wide Announcement
body: The annual company meeting will be held next Friday at 3PM in the main conference room. All staff are required to attend.
